summary: Adds a cursed Manor with some story.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][color=#ff0000]Description:[/color][/u][/b]

Adds a cursed manor near the entrance of the [color=#ff0000]Dark Brotherhood[/color]Â of Falkreath.

Your quest is to find out what happened to the manor, by solving keypuzzles and fighting a strong boss enemy.

A great reward is waiting for you!

You can also use the manor as a playerhome for vampires.

No DLCs required.

[b][u][color=#ff0000]Video:[/color][/u][/b]

[youtube]0MkDbLtmSfM[/youtube]

[color=red][u][b]Changenotes 1.6 :[/b][/u][/color]

- all Enemies leveled

- better Navmesh

- less reward

- minor Fixes

- the first key is now in the inventory of the skeleton

Thanks to AdayDr1en for rewriting the texts.

author: Katoari
